sub_title: Senior Clean Energy Analyst – Altenex Energy
summary: Passionate about renewable energy, sustainability, and fighting climate change. Currently working at Altenex Energy to help large energy consumers reduce their environmental impact and become more sustainable. Fluent in Russian and English, as well as a B1 level comprehension in German.
